doc.title: My American Boy
doc.plot: The show consisted of two hosts a panel of there were four elegant Cougars and four strapping Cubs. All of the participants were elevated on stage as to allow for maximum audience exposure. Surrounding the stage, a live audience was present, actively participating with the show and the DJ. Pre-screened questions were also introduced as well as open questioning from the audience. After which the show participants dispersed with their cubs into the crowd and enjoyed a night of dancing at the fashion-trendy Black Card ultra lounge.
